basePath.title: Base Path
basePath.description: The base path to use. Default is /discovery. For compatibility with spring-cloud use /services.

maxRetries.title: Max. Retries
maxRetries.description: The maximum number of times to retry connecting to zookeeper.

baseSleepTimeBetweenRetriesMs.title: Base Sleep Time Between Retries (ms)
baseSleepTimeBetweenRetriesMs.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to wait between retries. Default is 1000.

connectionTimeoutMs.title: Connection Timeout (ms)
connectionTimeoutMs.description: The amount of time to wait while connecting before timing out in milliseconds.
